captureOutput


static void captureOutput()
Divert output through System.out and System.err to newly created streams in capturedOut and capturedErr.

doTest


void doTest(java.lang.String testName)

fileContents


static java.lang.String fileContents(java.lang.String file)
The contents of the file named FILE as a String. Removes "\r" to avoid Unix/Windows differences. This method is useful for reading a file containing the expected output of your program.

maxFilter


static java.lang.String maxFilter(java.lang.String s)
The String S with all output removed except dumps and announcements of the winner. Also deletes trailing blanks.

restoreOutput


static void restoreOutput()
Restore System.out and System.err to their initial values.

runMain


static void runMain(java.lang.String file)
Run the main program as if started with java jump61b FILE Set out to everything the program writes to the standard output, and err to everything it writes to the standard error file. In both cases, canonicalize "\r\n" to "\n" to avoid Windows/Unix differences.
